document_data.name: Bertice Edermath
document_data.mainbody: '''Bertice Edermath''' was a young [[half-elf]] woman living in [[Phandalin]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Relationships:
Her father was [[Daran Edermath]], a retired member of the [[Order of the Gauntlet]] who maintained [[Edermath Orchard]] in Phandalin. 

She was in love with [[Grovet]], a [[human]] miner who was her same age.
document_data.History:
Bertice was born in the {{YearlinkName|1476}}.{{AI-time}}

When she was twenty years old in the {{YearlinkName|1496}}, she ran away from home with Grovet without telling her father, although it was an open secret in town. The young lovers headed south to [[Waterdeep]] along the [[High Road]], intent on starting a new life together.
